    #include <iostream>
#include <stack>
#include <cstring>
#include<cstdlib>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	for(int k = 0; k < t; k++){
		stack<char> s;
		char a[10000];
		cin >> a;
		char b[10000];
		cin >> b;
		int flag1 = 1;
		
		for( int i = 0; i < strlen(a); i++){
			if(flag1 == 1 && a[i] == '0'){
				continue;
			}
			else{
				 s.push(a[i]);
				flag1 = 0;
			}
		}
		int i =0;
		int flg = 1;
		while(!s.empty()){
			if(s.top() == '0' && flg == 1){
				s.pop();
			}
			else {
				a[i++] = s.top();
				s.pop();
				flg = 0;
			}
		}
		a[i] = '\0';
		flag1 = 1;
		for( int i = 0; i < strlen(b); i++){
			if(flag1 == 1 && b[i] == '0'){
				continue;
			}
			else{
				 s.push(b[i]);
				flag1 = 0;
			}
		}
		i =0;
		flg = 1;
		while(!s.empty()){
			if(s.top() == '0' && flg == 1){
				s.pop();
			}
			else {
				b[i++] = s.top();
				s.pop();
				flg = 0;
			}
		} 
		b[i] = '\0';
		unsigned long int n, m;
		n = atoi(a);
		m = atoi(b);
		long int nm = n + m;
		int rem;
		char d[1000];
		int flag = 1;
		while(nm > 0) {
			int rem = nm%10;
			nm = nm /10;
			if( flag == 1 && rem == 0){
				continue;
			}
			else if(rem != 0){
				cout << rem;
				flag = 0;
			}
		}
		cout << "\n";
	}
return 0;
}
